title: Question: How did wildlife get on top of the summoners rift?
body: I'm guessing the summoners rift is based high above near the clouds with waterfalls leading somewhere but for a snail, frog, butterflies and birds and whatever I've missed to get up there is pretty OP how did they get up there xD? I find it odd.

replies.body:
Really determined wild life. 



Actually isn't it supposed to be like a simulation at least in the old lore?
